text: “Eghtɨ dagheba otevir dughiam en kantri batogham, o arɨmariar kurar ekiatam otogham, o amɨnir avimɨn mɨn isitam izɨ azenibagh asɨghasigham, o azenibar itir dagheba pura kuram, o odezir avɨriba daghebar amɨ da agɨvam, o apaniba izɨ en nguibar ekiabar e korogh e mɨsogham, o arɨmariar igharagha garir avɨriba e gasɨghasɨgham,
